'tsho ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs rar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rag 'byor 'das pa'i 'du
shes na 'das pa 'a 'du shes kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na stongar nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs su mdar/ stong ra nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pasadamigs su med na stong pa nyid la/
'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor das ra t+ta 'du byed ni 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo// daci'i phyir zhan/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs su mang
de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmags par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das
pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo// de ci'i phyizhi na/ stong pa nyirjel 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stod pas dmigs//
su mad na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs na ma 'os pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo// de ci'aphur zhe na/ dang
pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmegasasu marado/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas ramigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhigasmos/
rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i tsher bas stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong ba nyid kyang stong panyis kyis stong pas

dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo// da ci'i phyir zhe ra/ stong pa
nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa dkyis stong ras pa dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos rab

'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo// de 'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmag

wa/ su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig slog/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo// de ci'i phyir na na/ stong pa nyid la//

ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su mang na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rag 'byor

daltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong panyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na

stong ba nyid la da ltar byung pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba nad ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhi na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs

su chod de/ stong ranyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs sumadan/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byord ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni de ltar byung ba'i 'du shes

kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pasadamigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmig

par 'gyur ba lta ci ga smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed na de ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa/
nya@#// nyid kyis stong bas dmigs su yod na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs ra 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byord ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba rnam par/

po shes pas stongo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong ras dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par

shu shesapa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i ba rol tuphyin pa na de ltar byung
bar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de su'i phyir shu na rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi
ramigs/ mnyam panyid la da ltar byung ba'adus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam par mi dmigasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus

dmags ba lta ci zheg smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus ramig blta yakhan zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshulakhrims kyi b.rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi nga rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmag/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na dus gsum mnyam pa nyame yam dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyamapa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus midamigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das ba 'dus/

dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta zhig sgos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha lo lag tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bzod/

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyi ma'i mthar mi dmagaso/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam nyid la mi dmigs rta/ de'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
mnyam nyid la 'dasapa 'dusam dmigs/ nyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs ]mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyidam ramigs na/
mnyamar nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos ( rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyis rol tu phyin

pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi la lol tu phyin pa nang ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te/ de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
dus kyang mi dmagos/ mnyam red la yang mnyam nyid mi dmashAn/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs ba lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta zhig smos/ da

[： ]ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu bya nepa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar midamigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa na dus gsum mnyam pa de la mdamigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyame da

pa la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi remigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs/ mam pa/ byed la lang mnyan 2 de ma dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid 'aka'adas pa'i dus dmigs pa lta mu zhig smos/ ma 'ongs

pa'i dus dmig lta zhig smos/ da lta'abyung ba'i dus dmigasar lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ra ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ shas kyi parol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mid+hamigs/

g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi phacol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la me dmigs te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam

mnyed la ma 'ongs pa'i dus la dmags/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyide ma dmigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa ltaishege smos/

ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig sgros/ daltar byung ba'i jus dmigs pa lta yang ci'og smyos/ rab 'abyor nang stong nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa

nyid ni de ltar byung bar mi de mig sa nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum manyam pa nyid la mdamigs te/ ri 'phying zhin/ ra'abyor mnyam pa nyid la 'jus pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa la ci thoge smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmag

bltasu zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyeran phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ phyi stong ba nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dam

thu stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la medamigs te/ deci'i phyir zhan/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dusamadamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la de ltar khyu

ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyam ranyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus rnamags pa ltaci zhige smos/ da ltar byung ba'i

dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi mo 'i mthar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyide nad ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong
nyidan dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs tedertse'i phyir yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid 'das pa'i dus midamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa//
nyid la da lta'akhyud ba'i dus kyang ma remigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs na/ mnyam pad la 'das pa 'dus dmigs pa zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigasapaltaci zhig slos/ da

ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang cizhig smyos/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stong pa byed stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ stong nyid stong pa nyid na de ltar spyod bar
mdamigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs rta/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs

[@ ]mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la me dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ni

zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mar mi dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyiTen phyi ma'i mthar mdamagos/ chen po stong pa nyide ni da ltar byung bar mi
dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te (de ru bzhin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa'i dal 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyamapa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da

lta cung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la medamigs na/ mnyam nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs ba lta cishis smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusatshigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung/

ba'i rus dmagos pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byoradon dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar rimigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyidan phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs//
don dmar stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid laskadas pa'i rjes medamigs ]mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma dmigs/ tshanyam
pa de la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyamar nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigasan/ mnyamal nyid la 'das pa'i nyes dmigs pa la ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusadamigs pa lta ci zhig
smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa ltar ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs 'dus byas stong pa nyidan phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong ra te
nad ltar byung na mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyeng na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor mnyamard la 'das pa'i dusami dmigs mnyam panyid la ma 'ongs
pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dusakyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
]pa'i dus dmigs pa lan zhig smos/ daltar byung ba'i dus dmigs la lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mdamigs/ 'dus ma byas stong nyid/

ni phyi ma'amatharatshidamikhogs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid na de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pid la
k+Sha 'das ra 'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus me dmags mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i lus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam ra/

nyid la 'das pa 'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon
gyi mthar medalagAs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid na phye ma'i mthar ma dmigs mtha' las 'dasal stong pa nyid ni de ltar byung bar ma demagos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
mnyam panyid la mi dmigs te/ de'i phyi nyin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam lated lam 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
waM mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dusadamigs pa lta cishog smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmig

la lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'a byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar tsha dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa'ed ni da lta//
byung bar ma dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te/ de me'i phyi nyin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pal la ma 'ongs
pa'i dus ma dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pad kyang mnyam pa de mi dmigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'jusala' dus dmigs pa lta zhig smras/ ma 'ongs

pa'i rjes dmagos pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung nga 'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rang 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' midamigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dramigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
dus mi dmigs/ mnyam rati re la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmags mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mdamigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa ltaci zhig smos/ da ltar byu ba'i dus dmigs pa la yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang bzhani stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
@#// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni de ltar byung bar ma dmigs rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs rdo/ de pen+ti/
phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid lam 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyamang ra
la mi dmigasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dusadamigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chos thams

cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid na da lta'i byung bar mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
#/ dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa 'dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i dus rmi legs

tshe pa lta nga ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid dang nyin kha byung bar midamigs/ rang
[4 ]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi rigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus midamigs/ mnyam/
pad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs ba lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa 'dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig

smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang cazhage smos/ rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa la don sngon gyi mthar mi dmags/ mi ramigasal stong pa nyid na phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs/ mi dmigs pa stong ba
nyer ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mdamigs pasong per na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs 11 de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma
khongs pa'i dus mi dmig/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam panyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma

khongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta zhig smos/ da ltar byungaba' dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid na phyi ma'i mthar
ma dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa de ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po mar pa stong pa nye ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ rang 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das
@# dpa' jus me dmigs/ mnyamapanyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid lad ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te// mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs//

na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dusaratshig pa lta ci zhig skyes/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci gi smos/ da ltab byungaba'i dus dmigs pa la yang su zhig smos/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid na sngon gyi

wA mthar mi dmigs ngo nyid stong pa nyid na phyima'i mahAr mi dmigs/ ngobo nyid stong pa nyid ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs ngo nyid stong pa nyid na dus gsum mnyim pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyi'i zhin/
tsha rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus me dmigs/ nyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
nyi de lam dmagasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'dus pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'ajusadamigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor

wA dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyere na phyi ma'i la mdamags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar me
[Q ]dmags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir na/ rab 'abyor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid lam 'ongs
dpa' dus mir chags/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyamal nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs/

pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ nga ltar byung ba'i dus dmags pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams na sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nyapar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
dmigs/ dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams nyid ltar byung bar ma dmigs/ dran pa nyibar gzhag pa rnams na dus gsum mnyam ra[”]nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
dus mi rnamegs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs ]mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ nyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i

dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa 'dus dmags pa lta ci zhig sbyos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyis mthar mi dmigs yang

dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/yang dag par sbyong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/
rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar phyung ba'i dus kyang mdamigs te[） ]mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi
dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig sbyos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi skopar rnams nidus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs// de ci'i phyi'i nyin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmigs/ mnyam pa de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyidi lad ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
tsha dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta bu zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor dbang po sman sngon gyi mthar mi dmagegs/ dbang po rnams ni phye ma'i mah+phar ma dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi ramagos/ mnyam pa nyid lad ltar byung ba'i dus
kyang me dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa 'dus dmigs pa lta ca zheg smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusaramigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs stobs rnams ni de ltar byung bar mdamigs/ stobs rnams ni du/
gsum mnyam pa teng la me ramigs rta de su'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi rnamags/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigasan/ mi ma ra nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig sos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung

ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar midamigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nid lta
byung bar ma dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs/ da ci'i phyir nyin rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam panyid la da ltar byung ba'adus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ ma pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmags pa lta yang ci zhoge smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na sngon gyi mthar me dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam ]
yan lag brgyad pan byama'i mthar mi dmigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam/
panyid la ma dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'dus pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs na/ mnyamar nyid la 'das pa'i dusaramigs pa la zheg smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
dus dmigs pa lta yang ca thog sa/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar ma dmagos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden la rnam
ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dusagasum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te/ rda su'i phyi zhin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmigs/ mnyam mnyidel ma
'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid lar ltar byung ba'i dusakyang ma dmigs te// mnyam nyid kyang mnyam pa nyi da la me dmigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dusadamigs pa ltar zhig smos/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa ltaci zhig smos da ltar byungaba'i dusadamigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rang 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs bsam gtan rnams ni phyi'i 'i mtha' ma domigs
bsam gtan rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtanams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid lam dmigs te/ da du phyi'i zhi na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid//
la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigasaM[？ ]mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'idus kyang mdamigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyamal nyid lam dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta bu zhig smos/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byungaba'i dus dmigs ra lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ da lod pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthu mi
dmigs/ tshad mdab rnams de ltar byung bar mi dmigs tshad med pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma de gas/ daci'i phyir che na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmags
mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs ra'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'adus kyang me dmigs te mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigasan/ mnyam nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmig blta ci
smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams na sngon gyi mthar mi dmig/ gzug mad
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams n phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzigs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar ma dmigs/gzugs med ba'i snyim par 'jug pa rnaman dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mdzem
bza/ tadudi nya'i phyi nyin rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa 'dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/

mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la cha ramags na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs ra lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dusadamigs ba lta yabcu zhogi

smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad na sngonagyi mtha' khridamigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad nad ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dus

tsha gas sam mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rten 'bya'i zhin/ tha byor mnyam pa nyid 'khas pa'i dus mi dmiganyim pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma de migs/ mnyam nyid la da ltar gyur ba'i dus kyang miramigs taM/ mnyam
pa nyid kyang mnyamang nyid la mi dam/sa na/ ma mo ral nyid la 'das pa 'dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ru zhig smos/ de ltar byung ba'i jus dmig sa ci zhig smras/ 'byor
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni sngon gyi mthar mdamigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyomasar/ra 'jug ra/dag med ltar
byung bar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni dus gsum mnyam nyid lam dmigs te/ deci'i lugazhan/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'jus pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid lam 'ong
ba'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das padus dmigs pa lta ci zhogi smos/ ma 'ongs pa 'dus

dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma chod pa dang/ smon pa med pa na sngon gyi mthar me dmigs/ rnam pa

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan makhad pa dang/ smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mo da ba med ltar byung la mi rmags/ rnamapar

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnadus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs te/ de ci'i phyi'i tshan/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmigs ]mnyam pa nyid la mkho

pa 'dus mingamags/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs taM mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigasan ]mnyamar nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmag pa lta ci zhigasmos/ ma 'ongs pa 'dus ngamagu pa/

lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams nasngon gyi mthar maramigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams

nyid ltar byung bar mdamagisaM/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmigs/mnyam pa nyid lam 'ongs pa'i ]
dus mdamags mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs// mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam panyid la mi megasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dusadam gas pa lha rtse zhig skyes/
ma 'ongs pa 'dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs palta yang rtse zhig smos ra 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams n sngonabyamathar mi dmigs teng 'dzin rnams n phyi ma'i mthar mdemegs

ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la che dmigs taM/ de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dme glu/ mnyam pa/
la ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung pa'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la ma domigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta cazhig smos/

ma 'ongs nga 'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhige smyos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ pha 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams na sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/gzud kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i thal mi
dmagis/ gzungs sgo rnams ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi ramigs to/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ ra'abyor mas pa nyid la 'dus pa 'dus mi rigs/
ma mang la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid lam dmigasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta zhig

smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus ramigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'adus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ phag 'byor de bzhin gang gi sa ba'i stobs can sngon gyi mtha' midamigs/ de bzhin gang shigs pa'i stobasacu

ni phyi ga'i mthar mi dmigs/ denganyin gshigs pa'i stobs bcu med ltar gyur bar mi dmigs/ du gat+tan gshigs pa'i stobs sku nyid dus gsum mnyamapanyid la mi dmigs taM/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid
la 'das pa'i dus mi rnamigs/ mnyam cad de la ma 'ongasar 'dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs mnyam lanyid kyan nyamaranyid la midamigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das

'dus dmigs pa lta cizhag smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ra ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang su zhig smos/ rab 'byor me 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rma'ajigs pa bzhin phyi
ma'i mthar medamigs ma 'jigams ni de las byang la mi da mag/ mi 'jigs ba bzhi dusug bum mnyam pa da lami dmigs ta/ da ru'i bye'i zhen rab 'byaramanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/

mnyam pa nying lam 'ongs pa'i rus mdzemigs/ mnyam pa de la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mingamags te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das po'i rus dmigs pa ltar zhig smos ma

rongs pa ni dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rang byon sogi yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar midamigs/ sos langadag pa 'chi ba bzhin phyi ma'i mtha' mi
dmags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni de ltar byung bar ma dmigs/ so esang dag par rig pa bzhi na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la me dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa

nyid la 'das pa'i dus ma dmigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmags te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la medamigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la

wA 'das pa'i dus ramigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs ba'i dus dmigs pa lta mi zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dusangamigasar lta yang ci zhig sbyos/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po na sngon gyi mtha'am dmigs/ byams pa/

chen po na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byamapa chen po ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs to/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ rab 'byor mnyamar nyid la 'das pa'i dus
nga ma demagos/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus me dmigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang ma dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa de la ma dmigs na/ mnyamar nyid la 'das pa'i

dus dmags pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'os pa'i dus dmigs pa lta tsazhog sgos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mademagis/ snying rje chen po

ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ni da ltar byung bar mdamigs/ snying rje chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid lami dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus me dmag
mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mdamigs te/ mnyam panyid la 'das pa'i dus ramigs pa lta ci/
zhig smyos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig sbyos nga ltar byung ba'adus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig sa/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad na sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ sangs

rgyus kyi mos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad na phyi ma'i mthar mar mgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad na dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la

ma dmigs nga/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byamanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mdamigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i jus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig sbyos/ daltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang zhig smos/ rab

'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bon phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo na de ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skyo bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la miramigs//
da ci'i phyir zhen sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyi'i 'o// rab 'abyor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mdamigs/ nyan thos na phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos nad ltar byung bar midamigs na
thos na dus gsum mnyamapa nyid la mdamigs/ de ci'i phyi zhin/ sems can dmigasasumed pa'i phyi ro/ rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas n sngon gyi mtha' ma dmags/ rang

[， ]sangasargyan phyoma'i mthar mi dmigs rang saargyas na de ltar byung bar ma dmigs/rang sangs rgyas zhi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ming la gsate/ riny+tsa'i phyir zhe na/ sems cad magrwasu med paphyi
ro skaba'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' n sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' na phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar byung bar mdemigs/byang chub sems dapa' dus

yaM gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs tede'u'i khyi zhin/ saMm can dmigs su med pa'i phyire'o// 'as 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshagasar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/de bzhin gshags pa na phyi ma'i mthar mi

dmago/ de bzhin gshegs pa med ltar byung bar ma dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ma dmigs rta/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/goms can dmigs suyod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub

sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas taM/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogasar bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
mams dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'breg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' tsams dpa' chen o lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtan zil gyis
mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo// de nas tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis/
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog pa chen po 'di la
bsubs shing/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan

po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid thob par 'gyulo/ bco ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dbag tu mam tsheg

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' n po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'byed la bsubs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thobab gyur po// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi

ba 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thog pa chen po'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rab 'byor de de bzhin

ne 3de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di labaslabs shing/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid brnyas par gyur to// brnyes so// gnas par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa las le'u bcu gnyis so// gzhas rab kyi
rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po den bzhi re de nas khyams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rang 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du soms so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gam gtsug gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar klog pachen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

ba 'byor de ltar gyur pa yang med de/ rab 'byor khyodananges rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dag ba'i chos gang yang rung sta/ nyan

thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshes sam/sangs rgyas kyis de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do// rab 'byor

N+NaM gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ byang chub

sems dpa' chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang laglu (gartsom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa// rab 'bya'adi lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ban der/ yang dag par sbyong ba bab dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang/

pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub yan lag bdunadang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med/
pa dang/ smon pa med par ng/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes ba drug dab da sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi

phal tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi la rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan kyi phacol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong ba nyid

dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong nyed dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmags pa stong ra 'de/

dang rangos po med pa stong pa nyare dang/ ngo bo nyid stong panyir dang/ rasaro mda'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobasaganu
@#// dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par 'gi pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang// snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

[）/ ]'dres pa bco brgyad dang mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang/ rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par sbyod pa sdu/ rab 'byor de dag na dag pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing

wA khongs su chud pa 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang/ shis ba

pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ sbyin r 'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs gang yin pa dang/ tsho ba gang yin pa dang/ 'du shes gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa/

dang nyamag gang yin pa dang/ gzugs gang yin ba dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa gang yin pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba gang yin pa dang/ rna ba gang

[yin pa dang/ sgra gang yin pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ rna ba'i dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang/ ba'i 'dus tarig pa'i tsun gyis tshor bgang yin pa dang/ sna gang yin pa dang/ dre gang

yin pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa gang yin pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang/ lcagang yin pa dang/ re gang yin pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes//

pa gang yin pa drang/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa gang yin pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang/ lus gang yin pa dang/ rig pa gang yin pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa/

dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'irkyen gyisatshor ba gang yin pa dang/ yid gang yin pa dang/ chos gang yin pa dang/ yid kyi rnamapar shes pa gang yin pa dang/ yid kyi

'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang/ ma rig pa gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ ming dang gzugs
gang yin pa dang/ sumad drug gang yin pa dang/ rig pa gang yin pa dang/ tshor bgang yin pa dang/ srid pa gang yin pa dang/ lan pa gang yin pa dang/ srid pa gang yin pa dang/ skye ba gang yin pa dang/

ga ga gang yin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang

yin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyiner gang yin pa dang/ gshisa'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ nang stongapa nyid gang yin pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin
rang / stongs nyid stongaranyid gang yin par ng/ chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ don dam pa stongaranyidag/nga lanel dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stong la/

ragang yin pa dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rangabazhin stong nyid gang yin pa dang/ chos

thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyidagang yin pa dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ nyid stong ba nyid gang yin pa

dang dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid gang yin pa 'a na pa nyid bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba rnams gang yin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang/ dbang po rnams gang yin
pa dang/ stobs rnams gang yin pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams

gang yin pa dang/ tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyomasalar 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang/ zalagyis gnon pa'i rgya mchod brgyad gang yis

@# dang/ rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang/ mthar gyis gnasapa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gang yin pa dang/ sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang/ kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang/

chas 'gog pa gang yin pa dang/ lam gang yin pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa chod pa gang yin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgrig gang yin pa dang/ dogazhan

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gar pan pa dang/ snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres rab cobargyad gang yin
pa dang/ 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang/ gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang/ dag ba'i chos gang yin pa dang/ mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang/ zag pa dang

bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang/ 'dus ma

byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang/ ji bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang/ 'dul ba gang yin pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa dang/ yang dgara'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ bsam gyis mkhyab ra'i rabyangs gang yin pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad na ldan pa lang ma yin/ mi ldan pa mang

ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogasab med pa 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa shastag ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'disan/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun/
par theg pa chen po ston to// de'i phyisazhin/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhig khyab tshad de/ de ltar na thig pa chen podang/ shis/

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnyis su med de gnyis su gyur mod do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba mad de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ bsam ga tan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su tshad ji gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gazhan la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phye

tsho nga yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan nas bya ba smad de/ de ltar na theg pa chen pa dang/brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su

mad de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de

gnyis su byar med do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su

byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po

lang gzhan la/ phyi stong ra ra kyang gzhan zhes byang mdar/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// klog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ phyi nang [”]stongalanyid/

kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su mar de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba yod de/

de ltar na rngog pa chen po dang/ stong pa nyir stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su mar de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po ang gzhan la/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mad de/ de ltar na thog pa chen podang/

chen po stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba marade/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang

ga rkyes sumadade gnyis su khyar mod do// thegal chen po yang gzhan l/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mdad/ de ltar na thog pa chen po dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ganyis su med de//
gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhal/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mad do/ de ltar na thog paN+Din pa dang/ 'dus ma byas stongam nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
yis byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mtha' las 'dasal stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med
@#// rdo gnyis subyar modo/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya pachod de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa skyong/

bkad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis subyar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gazhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ rab yod pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis

sumad de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/rang bzhin stong nyid kyang gazhan zhes bya bamadarda/ de ltar na rngog pa chen po dang/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis gu gyur

da de// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ganyis su med de gnyis su bya mad do/ theg

pa chen po yang gzhan la// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes byab mod re/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su medad gnyis su byar med do/ thogapa chen po yang

gzhan l/ me dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan thos bya ba marade/8ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dngos po

tshad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mo de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ ngo da stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan l/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba med do/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba med do/ de ltar na theg pa chen bo dang/ dran pa bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba

mdzad/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su mdade gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan l/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/

de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyang gnyis su med de gas su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mad de/ de ltar na sgrig pa chan ro

dang dbang po rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na thag ra chen po dang/ stobs rnams kyang gnyis su med

jiganyis su byab mad ro// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su med de
[， ]gnyis su byar med do// thog pa chen po sangagazhas la/ 'phag sa ra 'a lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar mdzad// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang// 'phags pa sde
bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su mar da gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gnyan la/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mang de/ ltar na theg pa chen pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis/

tshular de gnyis su khyor mor ro// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan zhis bya ba mad de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gnyis su chad de gnyis su byar char dod/
'gar chen po yang gzhan la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mdar/ de ltar na thag pa chen po dang/ gzugasamad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su mang de

gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
N+NaM do theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dag yang

gnyis su mad de gnyis su gyur yod do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa chod pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba chadare/ de ltar na thogapa chon/
bodang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa ming la yang gnyis su chad de gnyis su byar med do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mngon par shes pa rnams/
kyang gzhan zhes bya ba mad de/ de ltar na thog pachen po dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gnyis sumad dganyis su bya tsha do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes
bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen podang/ ting nge 'dzina rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhis bya ba med do/
de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su mad de gnyis su byar med do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan l/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhes bya ba mad de/
de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gnyis su medadaganyis su gyur yod do// thog pa chen po yang gzhan l/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi mang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ 8
ltar na theg pa chen mo dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byang chad do/ dachog pa chen po yang gzhan la so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba chod de/ de
ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ so so yang dag par rdzogo pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su gyar med do// rdeg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ snying rje chen po yang gazhan nas bya ba med//

de ltar na theg pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po yang gnyis su mad de gnyis su byur mad do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba dar/ de lta na

( thog pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gnyis su mdad gnyis su khyar med do// rab 'byor rnam grongosaros na/ theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
tsha kha gyur// gshis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur// de nas tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'dos 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngonagyi mthar mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' n phye ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/ gzugs kun tu
mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa'i g par bgyi'o// tshor ba kun tumatha' yas pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' kun tumatha' yas par rig bar bgyi'o// 'du shes kun
tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'ayas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du byed kun tsumatha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// rnam par

shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhisabargyab de lta bu yang ma mchis mdamigs so// tshor ba byang chub saA/

jal bzhes bgyi ba sde lta bu yang ma mchisam dmigs so// 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// 'du byed byang g soms dpa' zhes bgyi ba dolta bu yang ma mchis/
midamags so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnamal thams cad

duthams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sta ma dmigasan/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ral gyis yang
dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigasan byang chub sems dpa' gang zhag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sogasadabalazhes bgyi ba 'di ni
ming tsam du bas to/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag nyisabargyab yang bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' byang gsems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang

byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba ltalag/
dbang zhag mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gong zhage mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed lta lang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes lta
mang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub par ni gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang man
( par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lagam/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de na rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags l/ mngon par ma grub pa las gur na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par
'gyur ba'abyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam/ gal te de ltarobastan
pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jus/ yongs su mi 'jug/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yade ma 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

chen po de nishas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa la 'byor la 'daskad ces smras so/ tshar ng ldan pa rab 'byor nye'i phyi'i na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyi na/ gzugs

kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sa mas dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par 'ge par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun//
tumah+pha 'a las pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par byab yin 'du byed kun tumatha' yas pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas por 'ag par bya ba yin/ rnam pa gas
pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 'ag par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyon/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi
dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang mar rung ma dmigs pa yin/ 'dushas byang chub sams dpa' zhes bya ba da lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ 'dubyed byung
chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing ma dmigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing ma dmigs pa yin/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i
sbyoran daskad du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams rud du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigasan byang chub sems dpa' gang

zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la go/dmas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra tshodang ldan ra'ab 'byob ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ral gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong m
dmigasan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po gang zhig shasa'akyi kha rol tu phyin pa gang la garams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni'i 'i/

na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byoci'i phyi na/ de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag sum brgya yang//

wA bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dwapa' zhes bgyi yang/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar chos thams
nad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa la yang gang zhig mchisatshor ba mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'dushes mngon par grub pa la yang gang zhig mches/ du

byed mngon par grub pa la yang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis to/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// gong mngon par ma grub pa de 'tshol ba ma

bags so// gang mngon par ma grubal de 'du shes ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lagam so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byo

ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shadams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'amazhes smra/ tshodang ldan par 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las

gudun yang/ byang chub semA dang bsagad 'cham ro lta bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smA tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa chen ro'i/

sems mi 'jam yongs su mi 'jum/ 'gyod par ma 'gyur zhing/ yid mi 'jigs mi spang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces
smras pa dang/ tshodang ldan par 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras s// dang ldan pa 'dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi

dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang/ sems can dben pa dang/ sems can rang bzhi'i smad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shAr pra ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang

chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang/ sems can dben pa dang/ sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
mo mas can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dapa' dbus su midamigasaso// sems can stong pa dang/ sems can dpon pa dang/ soms can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can yod pa dang/ sems can stong pa dang/ sems can dben pa dang/ sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// phyi ma'i mthar midamig
so[﹚]dbus su mdamigs so// sems can med pa yang gzhan sems can stong pa yang gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa yang gzhazhig la//

byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhano/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa ka'i dra ti'ibu/ de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa

dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang/ sams nadaban pa gang yin pa dang/ sems can rang bzhanamed pa gang yin pa dang byung chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i

tsha mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha' dra ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mdamigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugasango ba nyid da pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sngonagyi mtha'am dmigs so// gzugs yod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'amathar mi dmigs so//

tshwa gzugs dben pa'i phyi'i byang chub samasadapa' phyi ma'i mashar mdamags so// gzugs ngo 'o de med pa'i phyi'i byung chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dma' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs stong nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su midamigs so// gzugs dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid
med pa'i phyir byang chub soms dpa' dabusazhuidamigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan par dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med bad/gzugs stong pa nyid dang/ gzugs dben pa dang/ gzugasango bo nyid med
bal/ sngonagyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mdamigs/dbus mdamigs taM/ gzugs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin ]gzugs dgon pa yang gzhan ma yin
gzugs ngo btod med la yang gazhan ma yin/ byang sgrub saMmasadama' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gnyanam yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar nagazugs med pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs po nyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chubs/
dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha'/nga yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med gnyis subyar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
ra ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa dkyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar m dogs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'/
@#// sngon gyi mtha' mdamigs so// tshol ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir gyar ba sogs dpa' sngon gyi mtha' ma demigs so// tsho ba yod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mdamagis//

so/ tshor ba stong nyid kyi phyir byang chub lams dpa' ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshol bdagen pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bye mchathar mi dmigs so// tshor ba ngo bonyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi re migegs so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chos dpon/

pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig/sa so/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i bya'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so// de cu'i phyir zhin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba med

pa dang/ tshor ba stong pa nyid dang/ tshor bdaban ra dang/ tshor ba ngob de mdabul/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmags phye ma pha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong

banyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor bango bo nyid med pa yagazhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang

gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar pra ti'iTe/ de ltar na tshor ba chad pa ga na pa dang/ rab stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa

ga nga yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyema'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su chad dganyis su gyur yod do// tshodang ldan pa

shAr dra ti'i bu/ 'du shes med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyim thal mdamigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' med chags so// 'du shes dbonala'i phyi'i byang/

chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mdamags so// 'du shes chod pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'amatha'achadamig

so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du shes med pa'i phya bya chusems dapa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs//

'dushes dbon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dma'os so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusasu mi dmigs so/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
'du shesamad pa dang/ 'du shes stong pa nyid dang/ 'dushes dban pa dang/ 'du shesango nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha'am dmag la/ phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs/ dbus mdamigs te/ 'du shes med pa yang
gzhan ma yin 'du shes stong gnyid khyad gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes yod med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'amang gzhan ma yin/ dbusakyang gzhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'du shesamad pa gang yin pa dang/ 'du shes stong nyid gang yin la

dang / 'dushes dben pa gang yin pa dang/ 'du shes ngo bonyid med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin

bde thams cad kyang gnyis su yod de gnyis su byar med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi lung byang chub

mams pa'i sngon gyi mthar mdemags so// 'du byerar nara'i phyir byang chub sems dor 'asngon gyi mthar ma dmigs so// 'du khyad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub samasadapa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/

'dukhyed mor pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmagos so// 'du byed dbanapa'i nyin byang chub samasadapa'/
byama'amathar ma dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyidm pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso/ 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmags so/ 'du byed
stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dapa' dbus su me dmags so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mdamigasaso// 'du byed ngo bo de re med ba'aphyir byang chub sems dpa'

dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan pa ng+kashA ra dwa ti'i bu// 'du byed mad ra dang 'du byang stong pa nyid dang/ 'du byed dban pa dang/ 'du byar ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha'
mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus me dmigs te/ 'du byad mar pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dubyad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin ]'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed
ngo bo nyid mad pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang bo/zhan ma yin no// tshodang ldan pa/

[E]shAr dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed do pa de med pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dapa'/

gang yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de dag thams rud kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu[7 ] rnam/
par shes pa med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigasaso// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
dpu'i byang bsaMms dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bde med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med/

pa'i phyi'i byang chub samasadapa' phyi ma'i mthar mi demigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dapa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam rar shes pa dbon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dapa'

phyi ma'i mthar mingamigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mah+phar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dapa' dbus su ma dmigs so// rnam

pa'i ngushe pa stongs nyer kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi demags so/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phurabyang chub sems

rgyudaba' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'e// rnam par shes pa med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ rnam par shes pa rabin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa nge ba de
mad pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmagos/ dbus ma dmigs te da rnamar shesal med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa byung ba de kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dkon la/
yang gzhan ma yin rnam par shes parob de med pa yang gzhan maleno/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yaragazhawayin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan m yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin ]

na/ tshodang ldan pa[=q]'i dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa mad pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa ngo bde chad pa

gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ba/nga yin pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gong yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de ga/sa su byar med do// tshodang ldan

pasmAshA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mib med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

sngon gyi mthar mi dmags so// mig ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngonagyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig med pa'i phyirje byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ mig stong ped kyi phyi'i

byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig rab napa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig ro bodi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso//
mig med pa'i phyir byang chugasams dpa' dbus su midamigs so// mig stong pa nyer skya warekyang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig rab n pa'i khya'i byang chub sems dpa' sus su ma dmigs so//

mig ngo bo nyid med pa 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ru'i phyir non/ tshodang ldan pa/ kA ra dwa ti'i bu yig med pa dang de mig stong pa de dang/ mgo rtaban pa dang/ mig ngo ba nyid mdu ba la/
sngon gyi katha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' midamigs/ dbus mi dmigs te de mig med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig dben pa yang gzhan ma//
yin mig nge co de med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dapa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin ma' mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tsho
dad ldan pa shAr dra ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig med pa gang yin ra dang/ mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ mig dbon po gang yin pa dang/ mig ngogo de mad pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dga'
gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang/ dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su mad re gnyis su byar mdado// tshe dang ldan ga sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rna ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnab stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dapa' sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs so// rna bdaba'apa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo ba nyid mad pa'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma dmigs so// rnal mar pa'i phyogs byang chub samasadar la thu ma'i mthar mi dmigasaso/

rnab stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dapa'i phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmags so// rna ba dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba ngo ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar medamigs so// rnal mar pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su medamigyiso// rnab stong pa nyid kyi khyer byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna dbanapa'i
bya byang chub sa mas dpa' dbusu ma dmigs so// rnab ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi'i byang bsams dpa' rabs su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan bkar dra ti'i bu/ rna ba med pa dang/ ni
ba stong pa nyid dang/ rnapa dngan pa dang/ rna ba ngo bo nyid med pa la// sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'am dmigs/ dbus mdamigs te/ rnab mad pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnapa stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dbenam yang gzhan ma yin/ rnakhango bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan m yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
